index.landing-title: Control your household expenses with ease
index.landing-subtitle: Manage your money wisely and reach your financial goals.

cards.1: Sign up effortlessly with just a few clicks, ensuring your financial journey starts smoothly.
cards.2: Seamlessly convert currency, keeping you updated on global financial trends.
cards.3: Switch between Spanish and English seamlessly, making the app accessible for everyone.
cards.4: Visualize your spending and currency trends through interactive charts and graphs
